nodes.text: The Galtea Run was a hyperspace route located in the Kathol sector at the edge of the galaxy. The Galtea Run, along with the Sebiris Run, crossed the Marcol Void into the Kathol Outback. The Galtea Run connected Galtea to Timbra Ott. The hyperlane was also responsible for connecting the Kathol Outback with the majority of the Kathol sector, passing through such worlds as Binaros, Jangelle, Pitann, Uukaablis, and Exocron.
